Ingredients: 1.5 oz prichard's lincoln county lightning, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, .5 oz cinnamon-candied ginger syrup*, 3 dash angostura bitters,  top club soda
Garnish: lemon wheel, sliver of cinnamon-candied ginger
Preparation:
fill a shaker with an old fashioned glass worth of ice. add all ingredients except for the club soda. shake vigorously for 20 seconds, then dump into old fashioned glass. set lemon wheel and sliver of cinnamon-candied ginger on top then top with club soda.

*cinnamon candied ginger syrup:
combine 1/4 lb. peeled ginger root (sliced 1/8" on a 45-degree bias using a mandolin), 2 cups of water, and 4 cinnamon sticks in a pot (or pan) and bring to cusp of a light simmer. continue to barely simmer for 30 minutes. add 1 cup of demerara sugar and stir until fully dissolved. lower heat and keep just below simmering. continue to heat until almost all liquid is reduced and remaining sugar is just beginning to caramelize (2-3 hours). remove from heat and spoon slivers of ginger (along with a generous dollop of now thick syrup) onto a sheet of parchment or wax paper. let cool for at least 2 hours then store layered on the paper sealed in a ziplock bag. remove cinnamon sticks and reserve syrup.

Name: mayan sacrifice champagne cocktail
Ingredients: .5 oz chinaco blanco tequila, .5 oz d'aristi xtabentun honey liqueur
Preparation:
fill chinaco stemmed flute with prosecco, cava or other dry sparkling.
garnish with luxardo cherry pinned inside of lemon peel and rested across rim.
the cherry garnish which will be ever so delicately laid across the top of the glass, should flame in my opinion. you can dip the in high-proof spirits and light it up!

Name: pacific kick
Ingredients: 1 oz japanese whisky, 3 oz amaro angeleno, 1 oz luxardo orgeat syrup, 1 oz lemon juice
Preparation: fill shaker with ingredients and ice. shake. strain into old fashioned or rocks glass filled with ice.

Name: citrus quo (adapted)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .5 oz luxardo limoncello, .5 oz luxardo aperitivo, 3 oz tonic water
Preparation: fill up a stem-less wine glass with ice and pour the ingredients over, stir and serve.

Name: the mayan premonition
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chinaco blanco tequila, .75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz fresh lime juice, 1 float bitter lemon soda
Preparation: fill up a stemmed wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.

Name: club med
Ingredients: .75 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, .75 oz barsol selecto italia pisco, .75 oz elderflower liqueur, 2 oz white dry white(preferably sauvignon), 2 oz club soda
Preparation: fill up a wine glass with ice then pour the ingredients, stir and serve.

Name: pisco sour
Ingredients: 2 oz barsol primero quebranta pisco, 1 oz fresh lime juice, 1 oz simple syrup, .5 oz egg white, 3 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: first, dry shake all ingredients. then, shake all ingredients vigorous with ice and strain into a cocktail glass. garnish with 2-3 drops of angostura bitters on top of the foam.

Name: jamaica paloma
Ingredients: 2 oz mezcal, 1 oz jamaica basil flower syrup*, .75 oz fresh grapefruit juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice
Preparation: flash shake, strain onto fresh ice, top with mexican squirt. salted starfruit garnish.

Name: ypioca chile punch
Ingredients: 2 part ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata classica, 1 part fresh lime juice, .5 part agave, .5 part ancho reyes ancho chile liqueur
Garnish: pineapple chunks, dried ancho chiles, star anise
Preparation: for a punch, combine ypioca, lime, agave and ancho reyes together. add fresh pineapple chunks, 3 thin sliced chiles (seeds included) and 1 star anise to garnish.

Name: prata punch
Ingredients: 2 part ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata reserva especial, .5 part lillet rose, .5 part guava nectar, .25 part fresh lime juice, .25 part agave,  top banfi rosa regale sparkling wine
Preparation:
for punch, combine ypioca, lillet rose, guava nectar, lime and agave. top with rosa regale sparkling and add sliced strawberries and thin-sliced lime wheels to float as garnish.

for individual cocktails, muddle 2-3 strawberry slices w/ agave and add ypioca, guava and lillet. add ice and shake to chill/mix. strain over ice and top with champagne. garnish with thin-sliced strawberry. remember, this is an aperitif style so it's meant to be refreshing but not necessarily sweet.

Name: engaged and cant-aloupe
Ingredients: 1.5 oz barsol supremo moste verde italia pisco, 1.25 oz fresh cantaloupe juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice, .75 oz beet sugar water*, 1  egg white
Preparation:
garnish with 3 drops of angostura bitters over foam.

*beet sugar water:
-- 50% beet sugar
-- 50% water

Name: mauritian made
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, .75 oz darjeeling simple syrup, 1 oz lime juice
Preparation: garnish: mint and lime wheel

Name: hotaling old tom gin
Ingredients: 1.5 oz old tom gin, .5 oz 7-spice syrup*, .75 oz lemon juice, 1.5 oz fever-tree tonic
Preparation:
garnished with orange peel and star anise. served over the rocks in a stemless wine glass.

*7-spice syrup:
-- pink peppercorn
-- star anise
-- sumac
-- cinnamon
-- nutmeg
-- coriander
-- cardamom

Name: hotaling seaside shandy
Ingredients: 1 oz genevieve gin, 1 bottle lager
Preparation: genevieve is hotaling's interpretation of genever, an ancient and mysterious gin style. the most common way to consume genever has always been straight. if you are planning to set sail for the day, picnic or do something else to enjoy the great outdoors, we recommend throwing a bottle of genevieve in the freezer the evening before your outing and moving it to the cooler day of. we sip it straight while enjoying a lager. glassware is dealer's choice, but cordial glasses are elegant and fun.

Name: blind luck
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo bitter bianco, 2.5 oz old tom gin, 2 bsp real lemon juice, 2 bsp strawberry-raspberry simple syrup*
Preparation:
hard vigorous shake with high density ice for 5-6 seconds. hawthorne and fine strain into a chilled martini glass. garnish with a mint sprig spanked and lightly rubbed around the edge of the glass. raspberry garnish and mint sprig attached to the raspberry. channel zest lemon bath over the glass.

*strawberry-raspberry turbinado "sugar in the raw" simple syrup:
-- 2 c water
-- 2 c sugar in the raw turbinado sugar
-- 15 raspberries
-- 3 strawberries, quartered
-- 3 mint leaves

as the water boils, slowly add sugar a few spoon fulls at a time and whisk vigorously into the boiling water until all 2 cups have been dissolved. continue to keep on high heat for 5 mins.
then take raspberries, strawberries, and mint leaves and macerate all components together and add into the boiling simple syrup.
reduce heat to low-medium heat for the next 15 mins.
after that allow simple syrup to cool down and rest for additional 15 mins.
double strain the simple syrup through fine strainers until all fruit, seeds and mint leaves are strained out.  allow to cool.

Name: the naughty & nice
Ingredients: 1.25 oz glenrothes vintage reserve, .75 oz drambuie, 2 oz woodchuck pumpkin cider, .75 oz spiced butter*, 3 dash bittermens elemakule tiki bitters
Preparation:
heat cider to 180°f. in a 5 oz cup pour the scotch and drambuie. add the heated cider. stir in the spiced butter. top with 3 drops bitters.

for the garnish, add 2 small cocktail stirrers, hang cookie off of the stirrer so that it leans off of the side of the cup.

*spiced butter:
-- 1 half stick butter
-- 1 tbsp pumpkin pie spice
-- .5 tbsp brown sugar
-- .5 tsp cayenne pepper

soften butter, add spices and mix with a spoon until all ingredients are combined.

**chrusciki cookies:
-- 1 c all-purpose flour
-- 3 egg yolks
-- 3 tbsp sour cream
-- 1 tsp vanilla extract
-- 1 tbsp dark rum
-- 1 pinch salt

using a mixer, incorporate egg yolks into sour cream, add vanilla and rum, kneed in all-purpose flower and salt to taste.
divide dough in half on a floured board and let rest for 20 min. working with half the dough at a time, roll out to 1/8 in. thickness, cut into 2 in. wide strips, cut these strips on the diagonal at 4 in. intervals.
heat 2 in. of vegetable oil in a large deep skillet to 350°f. make a slit in the center of each strip of dough. pull one end through the slit to form a bow.
fry 6 chrusciki at a time for 1 min. or less per side till golden brown.
drain on a paper towel and dust with confectioners sugar.

Name: the king's cranberry sauce
Ingredients: 1 pkg, 14 oz cranberries, 1.5 c brown sugar, .5 c orange juice, .3 c king's ginger liqueur, 8 whole pepper corns, 6  allspice berries, 5  cloves, 1 stick, 2 in cinnamon
Preparation: heat cranberries, sugar, oj and king's ginger over medium heat. place the peppercorns, allspice, cloves and cinnamon in a piece of cheesecloth with the end tied. add to pot. cook stirring often until cranberries soften about 25 to 30 min. refrigerate for 1 hour before serving.

Name: mexican sazerac
Ingredients: 2 oz chinaco reposado tequila, .75 oz d'aristi xtabentun honey liqueur, 3 dash peychaud's bitters
Preparation: ice: large block or spherical

Name: roasted cherry colada
Ingredients: 2 oz white rum, 1.75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, 1 oz coconut milk, 1 oz fresh lime juice, .5 tsp demerara sugar, 10 dash miracle mile forbidden barrel aged bitters, 3  roasted cherries, 1 oz black rum, 1 tsp everclear
Preparation: in a blender, combine white rum, luxardo, coconut milk, lime juice, sugar, bitters, 3 cherries, and 1 cup ice and purée until smooth; pour into a tiki glass and top with black rum. place halved cherry, cut-side up, on top of cocktail and fill with everclear before lighting cherry on fire.

Name: karlsson's kold brew
Ingredients: 1 oz karlsson's gold vodka (coffee-infused), .75 oz café moka, .75 oz cardamom syrup*, 2 tbsp soy milk coffee foam**, 1 pinch espresso powder
Preparation: in a boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients (not the foam) with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds. double strain the cocktail into an espresso cup. using an aero-latte frothing whip froth the coffee infused soy milk and spoon the froth over the cocktail. sprinkle with a little espresso powder.

Name: root down
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka (root-infused), .5 oz cardamaro, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, .5 oz grade-a dark maple syrup, 1.5 oz fenteman's ginger beer, 4 inch whole licorice root
Preparation: in a boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. double strain the cocktail over whole hard ice cubes in a 13 oz. rocks glass and top with the ginger beer. garnish with the licorice root.

Name: chilli vanilli
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .5 oz lustau amontillado sherry, .75 oz st. elizabeth allspice dram, .75 oz burned demerara sugar syrup*, 1 tincture bob's vanilla bitters, .75 oz vanilla powder, 1  egg white
Preparation: in a boston shaker combine all liquid ingredients in a shaker without ice and dry shake for 10-12 shakes to blend the egg whites. once blended add cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds and strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. let the cocktail settle and sprinkle with the vanilla powder.

Name: pear and cranberry fizz
Ingredients: 1.5 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 oz rothman & winter orchard pear liqueur, .75 oz cranberry juice, 1 tincture fee brothers cranberry bitters, 10  fresh cranberries
Preparation: in a boston shaker combine and muddle the fresh lemon juice and cranberries. add the remaining liquid ingredients except the club soda with hard ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds pour directly into a highball add a little more ice to fill the glass and top with the club soda. garnish with a few pear slices and fresh cranberries.

Name: asian affair
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .75 oz boiron kalamansi juice, .5 oz thai basil syrup*, .5 oz cocchi americano, 2 oz fentimans ginger beer
Preparation:
in a boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. double strain over ice into a 16 oz. highball or collins glass and top with the ginger beer. garnish with the candied ginger using 2 toothpicks placed on the rim of the glass.

*thai basil syrup:
-- 1 c chopped thai basil
-- 2 c granulated sugar
-- 1 c water

in a 1 qt. saucepot bring the water and sugar to boil and stir until sugar is completely dissolved. add the chopped thai basil to the pot and remove from heat. let the basil steep for 1 hour or until syrup is room temperature. strain the basil out of the syrup using a fine mesh sieve and store covered in fridge.

Name: pumpkin and spice
Ingredients: 1.5 oz oatmeal-infused karlsson's gold vodka*, 1.5 oz ginger beer, .5 oz oloroso sherry, .25 oz st. elizabeth allspice dram, .25 oz molasses, 1 bsp pumpkin puree, 1 tincture fee brothers black walnut bitters
Preparation:
in a boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients except the ginger beer. shake vigorously for 25 seconds and strain over fresh ice in a rocks glass. top with the ginger beer and grate the fresh nutmeg over the top.

*oatmeal-infused karlsson's gold vodka:
-- 750 ml karlsson's gold vodka
-- 2 c raw oats

using a large sauté pan toast the oats for about 10 minutes constantly watching them and making sure they don't burn. once aromatic and have a touch of color add the oats to a mason jar with the vodka and let infuse for 12-24 hours. strain and press out all the vodka from the oats. return the liquid to the bottle and store in a cool dark place.

Name: tambourine
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .75 oz pineapple juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice, .5 oz kaffir lime & tamarind compound syrup*
Preparation: in a boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. double strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. garnish with 1/2 piece kaffir lime leaf. (clap the leaf several times before placing on top of the cocktail to release the aromatics.)

Name: eden's apple
Ingredients: 1.5 oz apple & cinnamon-infused karlsson's gold vodka, .75 oz j. t. taylor's falernum, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 oz fresh cider, 1 tincture bar keep baked apple bitters
Preparation: in a boston shaker, combine all liquid ingredients with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 30 seconds. double strain into a frozen 4.5 oz. coupe glass. garnish with the apple slice. can also be served warm.

Name: swedish 75
Ingredients: 1 oz karlsson's gold vodka, 1 oz lemon curd (or a large bar spoon), 1.5 oz brut champagne
Preparation: in a boston shaker, combine the karlsson's and the lemon curd with whole hard ice and shake vigorously for 30-40 seconds. add the champagne to the shaker, stir until mixed well and double strain the cocktail into a 4.5 oz. coupe glass. garnish the cocktail with a lemon twist making sure to release all the essential oils into the glass. rub the entire rim with the twist before dropping the twist into the glass.

Name: barbary coast bulldog
Ingredients: 1.5 oz hophead vodka, .75 oz luxardo espresso italian liqueur, 2 oz cream, 2 oz mexican coca cola
Preparation: in a bucket glass, combine hophead, coffee liqueur, and cream. add ice and give a quick stir. top with cold mexican coke and garnish with a luxardo cherry.

Name: apple shrub spritz
Ingredients: 1 oz karlsson's gold vodka, 2.5 oz spiced apple shrub*, 2 oz chilled club soda
Preparation: in a chilled mixing glass combine the karlsson's gold vodka and the spiced apple shrub with cracked ice and stir for 20 seconds. add the chilled club soda to the mixing glass, stir just until mixed and strain into a frozen champagne flute. garnish with two apple slices placed on the rim.

Name: goat town swizzle
Ingredients: 1 oz old potrero straight rye whiskey, .5 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, .33 oz luxardo fernet, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz homemade orgeat, 4 dash angostura bitters, 3 dash fee bros orange bitters
Preparation: in a collins glass, add ingredients beginning with orgeat and ending with rye. fill glass half full with minted crushed ice. begin "swizzling" cocktail with stick until cocktail is blended and ice forms on outside of glass. top with more minted crushed ice and garnish with lemon and mint.

Name: the no.3 winter cup
Ingredients: 25 ml no.3 london dry gin, 25 ml king's ginger liqueur, 12.5 ml red vermouth (antica formula), 150 ml good quality sharp lemonade
Preparation: in a highball glass full of ice add no.3, king's ginger and red vermouth. top up with the lemonade and serve with a slice of ginger and a wedge of pink grapefruit.

Name: la la land
Ingredients: 1.5 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .5 oz aperol, .5 oz raspberry/white pepper syrup, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, .5 oz fresh cucumber juice, 4-5 pc fresh mint, 2 dashes celery bitters
Preparation: in a mixing glass muddle mint, add all other ingredients and ice, shake, fine strain into a double old fashioned glass over fresh cracked ice. garnish with cucumber slices and raspberries.

Name: vieux carré
Ingredients: .75 oz rye whiskey, .75 oz h by hine, .75 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth bianco, 1 bsp benedictine, 2 dash angostura bitters, 2 dash peychaud's bitters
Preparation: in a mixing glass, add all ingredients, then fill halfway with ice. stir with a barspoon until chilled, about 30 seconds. strain into a chilled cocktail glass. rub the lemon twist around the rim, drop it in the cocktail, and serve.

Name: mack's apple
Ingredients: 1.5 oz mezcal, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 oz apple cider reduction, .5 oz cinnamon-chipotle syrup*, 1 dash house-made apple pie bitters**
Preparation:
in a mixing glass, add ice and shake with all of the ingredients. strain over new ice (large sphere ice cube) and serve in old fashioned glass and grate fresh cinnamon over the ice.

*apple cider reduction: boil apple cider until it reduces in volume by half.

**cinnamon-chipotle syrup: bring 1 cup sugar, 1 cup water and 3 cinnamon sticks to boil, take off heat and let steep for 20mins, add chipotle powder and mix well.

Name: the ladybird
Ingredients: 2 oz pink pigeon rum, 2 dash fee brothers black walnut bitters, .5 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz luxardo fernet
Preparation: in a mixing glass, add the first three ingredients over ice. stir to chill. in a separate coupe glass, add .5 oz of luxardo fernet and swirl glass until it is fully coated with the fernet. strain chilled cocktail from mixing glass into the fernet-rinsed coupe (discard excess fernet). garnish by placing a luxardo cherry into the bottom of the glass.

Name: passionate pigeon
Ingredients: 50 ml pink pigeon rum, 50 ml lychee juice, .5  lime, juiced, 1  passion fruit, 1 float ginger beer
Preparation: in a mixing glass, combine pink pigeon rum, lychee juice and the juice from 1/2 a lime. add the pulp of one passion fruit (to prep passion fruit: cut in half, setting aside a small slice for garnish and scoop out the pulp and drop both the pulp and peel into the glass). add ice and shake vigorously. pour in a tall glass over ice, top with ginger beer.  garnish with the passion fruit wedge to serve.

Name: mayan decadence
Ingredients: 1.75 oz chinaco anejo tequila, .5 oz xtabentun liqueur (honey, anis), 3 dash bittermens xocolatl mole bitters, 3 dash fee brothers aztec chocolate bitters
Preparation: in a pint glass pour all the ingredients, stir and strain into a bucket glass 3/4 full of ice and garnish with an orange peel.

Name: the no.3 winter punch
Ingredients: 1 part no.3 london dry gin, 1 part king's ginger liqueur, .5 part red vermouth (antica formula), 6 part good quality sharp lemonade
Preparation: in a punch bowl add ingredients per person.

Name: xmas in juniper
Ingredients: 1 oz junipero gin, .75 oz spiced apricot syrup*, .5 oz house-made orgeat, .5 oz lemon juice,   egg whites,  top anchor christmas ale 2016
Preparation:
in a shaker mix all ingredients discarding the beer and dry shake vigorously to activate the egg whites. add ice and shake for about 10 sec and double strain into 8 oz glass and top with beer. garnish with a marigold flower.

*spiced apricot syrup:
-- organic earl grey tea
-- green cardamom
-- juniper berries

Name: muddled mission
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, 1 oz st. germain, .25 oz yellow chartreuse, .75 oz lemon juice, 1  strawberry
Preparation: in a shaker, gently muddle the strawberry. add the remaining ingredients and shake with ice. strain into a coupe. garnish with strawberry.

Name: the southside
Ingredients: 2 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 oz simple syrup, 5 leaves mint leaves
Preparation: in a shaker, muddle the mint and simple syrup. add the lemon juice and gin, and fill with ice. shake, and double-strain into a cocktail glass. garnish with a mint sprig.

Name: apricot blush
Ingredients: 1 oz vanilla flavored vodka, .75 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, 1 oz fresh sweet n' sour mix, 3 oz prosecco,  oz sliced plum, 2 sprigs mint sprig
Preparation: in a tall glass muddle the mint and plum with fresh sweet n' sour, pour the liquors then fill up with ice and top with prosecco.

Name: nikka coffey malt old fashioned
Ingredients: 2.5 oz nikka coffey malt whisky, .5 oz demerara syrup, 4 dash tempus fugit abbott's bitters
Preparation: in an old fashioned glass, muddle the lemon peel with the bitters and demerara syrup, just enough to bruise the peel and release its oils. add coffey malt and ice, and stir for 20 to 30 seconds, or until well chilled.

Name: honey basil smash
Ingredients: 1.5 oz english harbour rum 5 yo, .25 oz honey, 3  lime wedges, 4  basil leaves,  top ginger ale
Preparation: in collins glass, gently muddle honey, lime and basil leaves. add english harbour rum and ice and stir. top with ginger ale.

Name: nikka coffey grain perfect manhattan
Ingredients: 2 oz nikka coffey grain whisky, .5 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth di torino rosso, .5 oz dolin vermouth, 2 dash tempus fugit abbott's bitters
Preparation: in mixing glass or cocktail shaker filled with ice, combine whiskey, vermouth, and bitters. stir well, about 20 seconds, then strain into cocktail glass. add cherry and serve.

Name: juniperotivo
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, .5 oz simple syrup, .5 oz lime juice, .25 oz pomegranate syrup, 4 large mint leaves
Preparation: in mixing glass, using a spoon, crush 2 mint leaves in the simple syrup, and add gin, lime juice and pomegranate syrup. pour into ice-filled shaker. shake well and strain into chilled cocktail glass. float remaining 2 mint leaves for garnish.

Name: desmond's choice
Ingredients: 2 oz hirsch small batch reserve bourbon, .5 oz creme de cacao, .25 oz pierre ferrand dry orange curacao, 3 dash the bitter truth jerry thomas bitters
Preparation: in old fashioned glass, lightly muddle orange zest with bitters and orange curacao.  add bourbon and creme de cacao then stir with ice for proper dilution (depending on ice) and mixing of ingredients.

Name: cafe creole
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, 1 oz luxardo espresso italian liqueur, 1.5 oz heavy cream, .75 oz simple syrup
Preparation:
in one shaker, mix heavy cream and simple syrup and dry shake vigorously until it's whipped.
in another, shake pink pigeon rum and luxardo espresso with ice.  pour into a coupe, and then carefully top with the cream.  it should layer perfectly.  the vanilla complexity of the rum pairs awesomely with coffee and cream.

Name: la nueva moda (the new fashion)
Ingredients: 2 oz chinaco anejo tequila, .25 oz mezcal, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 2 drops agave nectar, 3 dash fee brothers aztec chocolate bitters, 2 cubes sugar
Preparation:
in rocks glass, make an emulsion by using a glass muddler (wood muddlers absorb the ingredients too much). place sugar cubes in glass. add mezcal onto the cubes. add bitters, onto cubes. add drops of agave nectar, onto cubes. add luxardo, onto cubes. muddle well to make a "syrup" paying attention the blending of all ingredients.
take the long orange peel and twist all the essential oils into glass. leave peel in glass.
place gläce luxury ice g-cubed in glass. rotate gläce g-cubed so that it becomes coated and chills the "syrup" swirl around the inside of glass. pour the anejo tequila over gläce g-cubed. stir with glass swizzle. garnish with 3 luxardo cherries, speared.

Name: and the cherry on top is...
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 3 oz vodka, .5 oz root 23 cherry almond simple syrup, 1 oz lemon juice,  splash club soda
Preparation: in the bottom of a cocktail shaker, muddle pitted cherries if using. add luxardo maraschino, vodka, fresh lemon juice and simple syrup. shake hard, then double strain (though a fine mesh strainer) into a tall glass with fresh ice. add a splash of soda and stick a cherry on top.

Name: phad thai
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka, 1 oz nigori sake (unfiltered), .5 oz fresh shibori yuzu juice, .5 oz simple syrup (2:1 sugar water), .5 pc thai chili, 4-5 sprigs fresh cilantro (stems on)
Preparation:
in the small tin of a boston shaker set, combine the cilantro sprigs, thai chili, yuzu juice, simple syrup and a small piece of ice. muddle these ingredients well. add the remaining liquid ingredients to the shaker with cracked ice and shake vigorously for 20 seconds.
double strain the cocktail over ice into a 13 oz. rocks glass.
garnish with the thai chili piece and the cilantro sprig.

Name: the swedish
Ingredients: 1.5 oz karlsson's gold vodka, 1 oz potato juice*, .5 oz benedictine, .5 oz lemon juice , .25 oz cinnamon honey syrup**, 1 bsp black pepper, .5 bsp salt
Preparation: juice potato and strain into a nearby usable container (must be done as close to drink making process as possible since oxidization will occur quickly). add vodka, potato juice, lemon, benedictine, cinnamon-honey syrup, and salt and pepper to mixing glass. add ice, and shake and fine strain over fresh ice.

Name: spring cleanse
Ingredients: 1  half small cucumber, 1  medium carrot, 1  green apple, cored, 3-4  kale leaves, 1  big handful spinach leaves, 1  small hunk ginger, .5-1 oz pastis prado
Preparation:
juice the ingredients and pour into a chilled glass (do not use ice or the drink will lose body).

top with pastis prado or absinthe and garnish with a sprig of mint.

Name: the king's winter cup
Ingredients: 1.5 oz king's ginger liqueur, 1 oz fresh pressed apple cider, 4 oz hard apple cider, 1 stick cinnamon stick
Preparation: method:  simmer on a gentle heat for 30 minutes and garnish with a cinnamon stick

Name: prickly pear margarita
Ingredients: 2 oz chinaco blanco tequila, 1 oz lime juice, .5 oz prickly pear puree, .5 oz agave
Preparation: mint salt on the rim. garnish with mint sprig.

Name: the sixth sense
Ingredients: 1 oz junipero gin, 1 oz luxardo amaro abano, 1.5 oz cream of coconut, .5 oz fresh pineapple juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice, 3 dashes angostura bitters
Preparation: mix all ingredients in a blender until smooth and icy. pout into a glass and top with 3 dashes of angostura bitters.

Name: pink punch
Ingredients: 3 c pink pigeon rum, 3 c orange juice, 3 c pineapple juice, 3 c ginger ale, .25 c grenadine, 1  fresh-squeezed lime juice
Preparation: mix all ingredients in a large pitcher, add ice, and enjoy!

Name: the 42nd round
Ingredients: 1 oz junipero gin, 5 oz compas box great king street blended scotch whisky, 1 oz byrrh grand quinquina, .5 oz anchor christmas ale 2016*, 2 dash bittercube corazon bitters, 2 dash the bitter truth orange bitters
Preparation:
mix all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir for 15-20 secs depending on the type of ice. strain over a large rock and garnish with an orange peel expressing the oils over the cocktail.

*anchor christmas ale 2016 w/ honey (reduction) 2:1 (2-parts beer to 1-part honey)

Name: the nutty sensation
Ingredients: .75 oz junipero gin, .75 oz h by hine, .75 oz chateau de montifaud pineau des charentes blanc, .75 oz oloroso & moscatel blend*, 2 dash the bitter truth xocolate bitters, 2 dash orange bitters,   walnut oil
Preparation:
mix all ingredients in a tin except for the walnut oil. utilizing the throwing technique, throw the mixture from one vessel to another vessel until chilled to air out the ingredients. coat coupe glass with walnut oil and pour the mixture. garnish with a dehydrated orange.

*oloroso & moscatel blend:
-- 2 parts césar florido moscatel special
-- 1 part lustau oloroso sherry

blend ingredients.

Name: maria canevari punch
Ingredients: .5 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, 1 oz fresh lemon juice, .25 oz simple syrup, 1 oz perfect puree white peach, 3 oz soda water
Preparation: mix all ingredients together.

Name: trip to jarnac
Ingredients: 1 oz h by hine, .5 oz orange juice, .75 oz lemon juice, .25 oz batavia arrack, .5 oz simple syrup, 1 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: mix all ingredients together.

Name: no.3 negroni
Ingredients: 1 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth di torino rosso, 1 oz luxardo bitter
Preparation: mix all the liquid contents together in a heavy-bottomed tumbler with ice. stir. add a slice of orange and lemon zest to decorate.

Name: clover holiday cocktail
Ingredients: 2 oz hophead vodka, .75 oz lime juice, .5 oz bay leaf-infused honey syrup*, 2 oz clover's gingersnap, 1 pinch cinnamon
Preparation: mix all together and shake and double strain into a coupe without ice. *bay leaf-infused honey syrup: • 3 cups honey to 1 cup water • 4 bay leaves, crumbled bring to a boil. stir until honey completely dissolves in water. turn off heat and allow 2 hours to cool.

Name: barrel aged ginger negroni
Ingredients: 1 part junipero gin, 1 part king's ginger liqueur, 1 part campari, 1 part sweet vermouth
Preparation: mix equal parts of the 4 spirits and age in a 5 liter oak barrel for 30 days. transfer into glass bottles and rest for a minimum of 3 days. make giant (2" x 2") ice cubes with an orange peel frozen inside. pour negroni on ice cube and serve.

Name: amaretto bourbon punch
Ingredients: 37.5 oz hirsch small batch reserve bourbon, 6.25 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 12.5 oz fresh lemon juice, 12.5 oz sparkling apple juice, 6.25 oz simple syrup, 37.5 oz seltzer
Preparation: mix ingredients in the punch bowl.

Name: merry sherry cobbler
Ingredients: 1.5 oz christmas spirit, 1 oz oloroso sherry, .25 oz walnut liqueur, 3 dash regans' orange bitters, 3 dash pear bitters
Preparation: mix ingredients together then pour over crushed ice into a julep tin. dust with salt, sugar, and cinnamon.

Name: french 75
Ingredients: .75 oz no.3 london dry gin or h by hine, .75 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 dash simple syrup, 1 float sparkling wine
Preparation: mix the gin or cognac, lemon juice and syrup in a cocktail shaker. pour the contents into a champagne flute. top up with champagne. add a luxardo cherry or a peel of lemon.

Name: a mi manera (my way) pisco punch
Ingredients: 2 oz barsol selecto italia pisco, 1 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, 2 oz minta soda, 1 pinch citric acid or lime juice, 1 scoop pineapple sorbet
Preparation: mix the pisco, apricot liqueur and citric acid ingredients together in a punch bowl and allow to rest for 45 minutes. place a large 2.2 lb. ice block 10 minutes before serving. scoop the pineapple sorbet in a punch glass and fill up with the mix, top up with mint-flavored soda. garnish with candied pineapple wheel from dress the drink.

Name: you're bitter than that
Ingredients: .75 oz blanco tequila, .75 oz luxardo bitter bianco, .75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .75 oz fresh lime juice, .25 oz rich simple syrup (2:1)
Preparation: mount all ingredients in a shaker tin. add ice. hard shake. double strain into a chilled coupe glass. garnish with orange twist.

Name: cocao martini
Ingredients: 2.5 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .5 oz ginger brown*, 4 dash hella hula bitters, 3 beans cocao beans
Preparation: muddle 3 cacao beans in a mixing glass, add vodka, ginger-brown sugar, and bitter beast hella hula bitters. add ice and vigorously shake to incorporate cacao flavor. fine strain into a martini glass. garnish with a cocao bean.

Name: on the flipside
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, 1 oz lime juice, .75 oz simple syrup, 2  mint leaves, muddled, 3  cucumber slices, muddled
Preparation: muddle 3-4 cucumber slices and a couple mint leaves. shake and strain into martini or coupe glass. garnish with lime or mint or cucumber.

Name: farmer's gold
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka, .75 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 oz simple syrup (1:1), 3 dash regans' orange bitters, 5 large basil leaves, 16 whole black peppercorns
Preparation: muddle 4 basil leaves, 16 peppercorns and simple syrup in shaker tin. add all other ingredients except final basil leaf. add ice. shake vigorously. fine strain into chilled cocktail glass. express lemon oil from lemon swath over drink. garnish with lemon swath and final basil leaf.

Name: winter swizzle
Ingredients: 2 oz pink pigeon rum, 1 oz fresh lime juice
Preparation:
muddle a small handful of fresh mint leaves, ¾ oz simple syrup (equal parts sugar and water)
1 oz fresh lime juice.
add crushed ice to the glass to fill half way.
pour in 2 oz of pink pigeon.
swizzle to incorporate ingredients and slowly add in the rest of the crushed ice.

Name: lost at sea
Ingredients: 2 oz king's ginger liqueur, 1 oz lime juice, .5 oz cane sugar syrup, 2 oz club soda
Preparation: muddle basil in mixing glass, add all ingredients except club soda. shake and strain into a collins glass, top with club soda.  top with crushed ice and garnish with a basil sprig.

Name: feingold
Ingredients: 2 oz brandy, .5 oz orange cordial, 1 bsp luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, 1  luxardo cherry (muddled), 1 dash aromatic bitters, 1 dash cherry bitters
Preparation: muddle cherry in liquid ingredients. shake, double strain over cracked ice. garnish with two more cherries on a pick with an orange flag.

Name: lovage in the garden
Ingredients: 2 oz hophead vodka, 3  sun gold cherry tomatoes, 4  lovage leaves, .75 oz lime juice, .5 oz agave syrup (1:1 agave to water), .5 oz luxardo aperitivo, 1 pinch hepps ghost pepper salt
Preparation: muddle everything in a tin except hophead. then add hophead and ice and shake and strain into a rocks glass with ice and garnish with a lovage sprig.

Name: georgia old fashioned
Ingredients: 2.5 oz nikka coffey grain whisky, .25 oz tippleman's barrel smoked maple syrup, 2 dash regans' orange bitters, 5 dash angostura bitters, 1 disc orange, 1 disc lemon, 1 slice peach
Preparation: muddle fruit, bitters and syrup. add ice (1 large cube if available). top with whisky. long stir.

Name: stroll through the park
Ingredients: 2 oz barsol primero quebranta pisco, .5 oz simple syrup, .5 oz orange juice, .5 oz lemon, 1 bsp el guapo tonic syrup, 4 dash el guapo tonic bitters, 3  cucumber slices, 2  mint sprig
Preparation: muddle mint and cucumber with the simple syrup in a shaker tin. combine the remainder of the ingredients in the tin. shake vigorously. double strain with a fine mesh strainer into a collins glass. fill with ice and garnish with a cucumber slice.

Name: naughty nikka
Ingredients: 2 oz nikka whisky taketsuru pure malt 12 yo, 1 oz fresh ginger syrup, 1 slice orange slice, 1 dash chinese five spice bitters
Preparation: muddle orange slice. add nikka. add ginger syrup. stir over ice. add bitters.

Name: masataka's vision
Ingredients: 2 oz nikka whisky taketsuru pure malt 12 yo, .5 oz luxardo amaro abano, 3 dash house-made rasta bitters
Preparation: muddle orange twist with sugar. add ice. pour ingredients over ice. add bitters

Name: ginger pigeon
Ingredients: 1 oz pink pigeon rum, .5 oz luxardo aperitivo, .5 oz simple syrup, .5 oz lemon juice, 1 float ginger beer, 4 pieces chopped pineapple, 3 pieces ginger root
Preparation: muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup, then add aperitivo and rum, shake well, over ice and top up with ginger beer.

Name: spice and stormy
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, .5 oz simple syrup, .5 oz lemon juice, .5 oz luxardo bitter, 1 float ginger beer, 4 pieces pineapple, 4 pieces ginger root
Preparation: muddle pineapple and ginger root, lemon juice and simple syrup. add rum. shake well, over ice and top with ginger beer and luxardo bitter

Name: stone fruit patch v2
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz peach puree, .75 oz lime juice, 3  raspberries, 1 oz sparkling wine
Preparation: muddle raspberries in mixing glass. add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. shake vigorously and strain into a well chilled coupe. top off with sparkling wine. garnish with raspberry and mint.

Name: stone fruit patch v1
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz peach puree, .75 oz lime juice, 3  raspberries
Preparation: muddle raspberries in mixing glass. add remainder of ingredients in a mixing glass with fresh ice. shake vigorously strain over fresh ice. garnish with raspberry and mint.

Name: mint garden
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chinaco reposado tequila, .5 oz luxardo triplum (triple sec), .75 oz fresh grapefruit juice, .5 oz lemon juice, .5 oz simple syrup, 4 pieces red bell pepper, 4 oz mint sprigs
Preparation:
muddle red pepper and mint. add all other ingredients. shake well over ice and strain into a chilled martini glass.
garnish with red pepper slice and mint sprig.

Name: sabotage
Ingredients: 2 oz breck bourbon, .5 oz dancing pines black walnut bourbon, .5 oz punt e mes, .25 oz king's ginger liqueur
Preparation: muddle sage and thyme. stirred, over ice in single rocks glass. burnt orange, and thyme sprig to garnish.

Name: rhapsody in red
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chinaco blanco tequila, 1 oz wild hibiscus tea, .5 oz fresh lime juice, .5 oz agave nectar,   strawberries,  top sparkling water
Preparation: muddle strawberries in a shaker with agave nectar, add lime juice, hibiscus tea, and chinaco blanco. top with sparkling water.

Name: cherry old fashioned
Ingredients: .5 tsp demerara sugar, 1  roasted cherry, 2 oz cherry-infused vodka, .25 tsp amaro di angostura, .25 tsp luxardo maraschino liqueur, 5 dash miracle mile forbidden barrel aged bitters
Preparation:
muddle sugar and 1 roasted cherry in a rocks glass until the sugar has dissolved; add vodka, amaro, maraschino, and bitters and stir. add 1 large ice cube and garnish with half a roasted cherry and the tarragon.

cherry-infused vodka:
- 1 cup pitted cherries, quartered
- 1 cup vodka
combine cherries and vodka in a bottle; cover, and let sit to meld the flavors for 3-5 days.

Name: basil gin and tonic
Ingredients: 1 oz lime juice, 1 spg basil, 2 oz tonic water, 1 oz junipero gin
Preparation: muddle the basil with the lime juice, then add tonic water. fill glass with ice and stir in the gin.

Name: kumquat smash
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo triplum (triple sec), 1 oz ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata classica, .5 oz luxardo sour cherry syrup (previously amarena), 5  kumquats, 1 float mango flavored rum
Preparation: muddle the fruit with syrup in a mixing glass. add ice and shake vigorously. pour all ingredients(do not strain) in a tumbler glass. add a float of mango flavored rum.

Name: mystique green (adapted)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .75 oz luxardo triplum (triple sec), .75 oz elderflower liqueur, 1 oz fresh lime juice, .5  kiwi
Preparation: muddle the kiwi pulp with lime juice in a shaker tin. add ice and liquors and shake vigorously. strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: nara mule
Ingredients: 2  kumquats, 2  lychee, 2 oz bulleit rye, 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, .75 oz fresh lemon juice, .5 oz simple syrup, .5 oz egg white, .5 oz fever tree ginger beer
Preparation: muddle the kumquats and lychee in a cocktail shaker. add the whiskey, king's ginger, lemon juice, syrup and white egg, and shake very hard. double strain into a highball glass filled with ice spheres.

Name: the reserved king
Ingredients: 2.5 oz glenrothes vintage reserve, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, 3-4 dash angostura bitters,   lemon peel
Preparation: muddle the lemon peel and bitters with the king’s ginger to release the oils.  add scotch, stir, and enjoy.

Name: buccaneer
Ingredients: 2 oz junipero gin, .5 oz campari, .5 oz velvet falernum, 1 oz lime juice, .5 oz simple syrup, 3 large chunks pineapple
Preparation: muddle the pineapple adding more or less simple syrup as needed and depending on sweetness of the pineapple. add all other ingredients. give the mixture a hard shake. double strain into chilled coupe.

Name: sage & sound
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, 1 oz white port, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz honey cinnamon syrup*, 1  whole egg, 8  muddled sage leaves
Preparation:
muddle the sage in a mixing tin. add the remaining ingredients and dry shake (no ice) for 15 seconds. add ice and shake another 15 seconds to chill down the drink. double strain into a large coupe glass. garnish with a whole star anise floated in the middle of the egg white.

*honey cinnamon syrup:
-- 16 oz honey
-- 2 cinnamon sticks
-- 8 oz water
combine all the ingredients together in a pot. place on the stove and bring to a simmer, stirring the honey so it doesn’t burn and let the pot simmer for 20 minutes. remove from heat and place on an ice bath. place in a container and label and date it. store in the fridge for up to 2 weeks.

Name: japonais no.3
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, 1 oz orange juice, 1 dash simple syrup, 2  cucumber slices, muddled, 2  raspberries, muddled
Preparation: muddle two cucumber slices, two raspberries and simple syrup in a highball, add ice. shake gin, ginger liqueur and orange juice with ice. strain into highball glass.  garnish with a candied ginger stick.

Name: pda
Ingredients: 1.5 oz new york apple whiskey, 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, .75 oz lemon, .5 oz lemongrass ginger syrup, .5 oz egg white
Preparation: muddled ginger root. shaken, served up, cinnamon stick and apple to garnish.

Name: apples & grapes
Ingredients: 1.5 oz tempus fugit kina l'aero d'or, 1 oz c. drouin pommeau de normandie, 2 dash orange bitters
Preparation: on the rocks with twist.

Name: the proverb
Ingredients: 2 oz h by hine, .5 oz maurin quina, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 1 dash angostura bitters, 2 dash black walnut bitters
Preparation: place all ingredients in a mixing glass. add ice and stir until proper dilution. strain over a large hand cut ice cube placed in a double rocks glass. garnish with a luxardo maraschino cherry on a pick.

Name: raspberry batida
Ingredients: 2 oz ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata reserva especial, 1 oz sweetened condensed coconut milk, 1 oz almond milk, .5 oz briottet creme de framboise (raspberry), .5 oz tempus fugit creme de cacao, 1 handful fresh raspberries, 2 dash rubarb bitters
Preparation: place all ingredients in a mixing tin, muddle fresh raspberries, add ice and shake until tin is frosty. strain into a chilled highball glass. garnish with orange wedge.

Name: ode to kinshi
Ingredients: 1.5 oz nikka whisky yoichi single malt 15 yo, .75 oz cocchi americano rosa, .5 oz luxardo amaro abano, 5 dash bittermens xocolatl mole bitters
Preparation: place all ingredients into a yarai mixing glass with ice and stir. strain into a coupe. garnish with an apple slice.

Name: junipero gin and tonic
Ingredients: 2 oz junipero gin, 4 oz fever-tree tonic water, 3 cubes tonic water ice cubes*
Preparation:
place ice cubes in a rocks glass. add ingredients. garnish with your choice of: rosemary, basil, lavender, edible flowers, or a lemon, lime or orange twist.

*tonic water ice cubes:
fill an ice cube tray with tonic water and freeze.

Name: l'aviation
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, 0.5 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 0.5 oz tempus fugit liqueur de violettes, .75 oz fresh lemon juice
Preparation: place ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake hard for seven seconds. double strain into a chilled martini glass and garnish with lemon peel.

Name: the kings mule
Ingredients: 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, 3 dash orange bitters, 5 oz sparkling wine
Preparation: place king's ginger and orange bitters in a champagne flute, and top with sparkling wine. no garnish.

Name: the bacchus cocktail
Ingredients: 5  concord grapes, 3  blackberries, 1.5 oz barsol primero quebranta pisco, 1 oz crème yvette, 1 oz lemon juice, .5 oz egg white
Preparation: place the concord grapes and blackberries in a shaker and muddle. add the rest of the ingredients and ice. shake, and strain into a chilled coupe. garnish with concord grapes and lemon peel twisted to release oils.

Name: garrison's new fashioned
Ingredients: 2 oz garrison brothers flagship bourbon, .5 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, 2 dash australian bitters company aromatic bitters,   lemon peel
Preparation: place the lemon peel in an old fashioned glass and muddle with bitters. in a mixing glass filled with ice, add the bourbon and apricot liqueur, then strain into the glass. garnish with cherry and orange slice, and serve over an ice sphere.

Name: pina del este
Ingredients: 1.5 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 4  lime wedges, 1  pinapple wheel, .5 oz gomme syrup, 1 float pisco
Preparation: place the lime wedges and pinapple in a tumbler glass with gomme syrup and muddle briskly, then add ice and amaretto. stir well and serve with a float of pisco.

Name: vida verde (adapted)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chinaco blanco tequila, .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 1.5 oz lime sweet n' sour mix,  oz cucumber wheels,  oz sprigs of mint
Preparation: place the mint and cucumber in a mixing glass and muddle briskly, then add sour mix and liquor. shake with ice and double strain over ice into a stemmed glass.

Name: culebra
Ingredients: 1.5 oz rhum agricole-style, .75 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, .5 oz fresh lime juice, 4 oz cola, 3 oz mint sprigs, 2 dash bitters
Preparation: place the mint in a collins glass and muddle for a few seconds to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

Name: morlacco julep
Ingredients: 1.25 oz brandy de jerez, .75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, 4 sprigs mint, 1 float luxardo amaretto di saschira
Preparation: place the mint in a tumbler glass and muddle briskly to release the essential oils, then add the cherry liqueur and the brandy. fill up the glass with crushed ice, stir well and serve with a float of luxardo amaretto. garnish with 4 sprigs of mint and 3 luxardo cherries.

Name: sorrentino
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo limoncello, 1 oz luxardo bitter, 1 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth di torino rosso, 2 oz club soda,   fresh thyme
Preparation: place the thyme in a tumbler glass and muddle to release the oils, then add ice and ingredients, stir well and serve.

Name: soma fizz
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, .5 oz lemon juice, .75 oz luxardo triplum (triple sec), .75 oz heavy cream, 2 dash orange bitters, 2 oz club soda
Preparation: pour 2 oz. of club soda into a collin’s glass. hard shake first five ingredients with ice for at 20 seconds. slowly strain into the collins glass. garnish with an orange wedge.

Name: the ginger royale
Ingredients: 35 ml king's ginger liqueur, 140 ml champagne
Preparation: pour a generous measure of the king's ginger into a flute. add chilled champagne to taste.

Name: the royal king
Ingredients: 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, 4 oz champagne
Preparation: pour a generous measure of the king's ginger into a flute. add chilled champagne to taste.

Name: brazilian mai tai
Ingredients: 1.5 oz ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata classica, 3 oz mai tai mix, 1 splash soda water, 1 float english harbour rum
Preparation: pour all ingredients and shake in tin. pour into bucket. top with rum float, then garnish.

Name: sorriso (adapted)
Ingredients: 1 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz pear flavored vodka, .5 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz sherry, 2 dash bitters
Preparation: pour all ingredients in a mixing glass filled with ice. stir well and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: pacific breeze
Ingredients: 1.5 oz luxardo triplum (triple sec), .75 oz watermelon liqueur, 3 oz cranberry juice,  oz fresh lime sweet n' sour mix
Preparation: pour all ingredients in a shaker with ice. shake and strain over ice into a collins or pilsner glass.

Name: heart breaker
Ingredients: 1.5 oz bonded rye, .5 oz luxardo amaro abano, .5 oz punt e mes, 7 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: pour all ingredients into a mixing glass with ice. stir to chill and dilute. strain into a chilled cocktail glass. express the oil from the twist over the drink and discard.

Name: negroni
Ingredients: 1 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth di torino rosso, 1 oz luxardo bitter
Preparation: pour all ingredients into an ice-filled old-fashioned glass, and stir approximately 20 seconds. add garnish.

Name: blood & sand
Ingredients: .75 oz glenrothes vintage reserve, .75 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth di torino rosso, .75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .75 oz orange juice
Preparation: pour all ingredients into cocktail shaker filled with ice cubes. shake well. strain into coupe glass. flame orange zest over the top of the glass.

Name: harms' way
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo bitter bianco, 1.25 oz blanco tequila, .25 oz d.o.m benedictine, 1 dash bittermens xocolatl mole bitters
Preparation: pour all liquid ingredients into a mixing glass and stir about 55 times for proper dilution and optimal clarity. strain into a chilled coupe. twist fresh lemon peel over cocktail for aroma. garnish with a simple lemon peel, trimmed neatly.

Name: amaretto rose
Ingredients: 1.5 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, .5 oz lime juice,  fill club soda
Preparation: pour amaretto and lime juice over ice in a collins glass. fill with club soda and serve.

Name: the touch  of glass
Ingredients: 1.5 oz brandy de jerez (foie gras-infused), 2-3 drops truffle tincture,   atomized pipe tobacco essence
Preparation: pour brandy into a brandy snifter. top with 2-3 drops of truffle tincture. spray pipe tobacco essence on wrist. smell wrist, sip drink, and enjoy.

Name: la capilla
Ingredients: 1.5 oz mezcal, .75 oz pierre ferrand curaçao, .5 oz gordy’s cocktail pickle brine, 1 oz watermelon juice, .5 oz fresh grapefruit juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice
Garnish: watermelon wedge, lime zest, maldon sea salt
Preparation:
pour ingredients in a shaker tin, add ice and shake well.

fine strain the drink into a double rocks glass filled with ice.
 
balance a small watermelon triangle on top of the glass. grate fresh lime zest on top using a microplane, and then sprinkle with maldon salt.

Name: palais royal
Ingredients: 3 oz champagne, 1 oz h by hine, .33 oz cherry brandy, 1 tsp lemon juice
Preparation: pour ingredients into a wine glass half-filled with crushed ice. garnish with a half-slice of lemon and a maraschino cherry.

Name: rothes julep
Ingredients: 2 oz glenrothes vintage reserve,   simple syrup, 5  mint leaves
Preparation: pour ingredients into cocktail shaker and shake vigorously with ice. strain into a rocks glass over crushed ice with a mint sprig garnish.

Name: rio de janeiro mule
Ingredients: 1.5 oz ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata classica, 1.5 oz ginger citrus agave blend, 5 oz ginger ale, 1 dash aromatic bitters
Preparation: pour ingredients into mug, fill with ice. top with ginger ale. roll into tin. roll back into mug. garnish.

Name: fernet frappe
Ingredients: 1.5 oz luxardo fernet, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, 2 oz cola, 1 wedge lemon juice
Preparation: pour ingredients over crushed ice into a stemmed glass, stir well and serve.

Name: red bud trail
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz dry vermouth, .25 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth di torino rosso, 1 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: pour into shaker over ice and shake well. serve straight up in a martini glass with an orange twist.

Name: the twinger
Ingredients: 1.5 oz king's ginger liqueur,  top fever-tree ginger ale, 2 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: pour king's ginger into an ice-filled collins glass. top off with fever-tree ginger ale. add bitters, and squeeze lime over and serve.

Name: no.3 & t
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 lemon lemon, 1 fill tonic water
Preparation: pour no.3 gin into a highball glass over ice cubes. add a slice of lemon and stir. top up with tonic water to taste.

Name: 3 & tree
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin,  top fever-tree tonic water, .25 oz maurin quina
Preparation: pour no.3 into ice-filled collins glass. top off with fever-tree tonic water to just below rim of the glass. float .25 oz. of maurin quina on top of cocktail. garnish with small spoonful of fresh pomegranate seeds.

Name: crooked kilt
Ingredients: 1.5 oz glenrothes vintage reserve, .75 oz lime juice , .5 oz green chartreuse, .5 oz velvet falernum, .5 oz pineapple juice
Preparation: pour over crushed ice with a mint garnish.

Name: orange crush
Ingredients: 2.5 oz glenrothes vintage reserve
Preparation: pour over crushed ice with zest. garnish with an orange peel.

Name: san fran soda
Ingredients: 1.25 oz hophead vodka, .5 oz fresh lime juice,  splash soda water,  top steam beer
Preparation: pour over ice in a pint glass, then fill with steam beer. garnish with a lemon wedge and a straw.

Name: simply perfecto
Ingredients: 2 oz barsol perfecto amor (aperitif wine)
Preparation: pour perfecto amor over ice and garnish with an orange wheel.

Name: château montifaud creation
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chateau de montifaud cognac vs, 1 oz lemon juice, .25 oz orgeat (almond) syrup, .25 oz triple sec,  top lemonade
Preparation: pour the cognac and lemon juice into the glass and then add orgeat syrup; fill with ices cubes and mix with a spoon. at the end, add lemonade and lemon peel.

Name: château montifaud on the rocks
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chateau de montifaud cognac xo, 3  ice cubes
Preparation: pour the cognac into the glass and add ice cubes. perceive the aromas that are released as a summer rain that reveals the secrets of the nature...

Name: château montifaud pink love
Ingredients: .75 oz chateau de montifaud xo silver, .75 oz sugar syrup, .75 oz lemon juice, 3  raspberries,  fill champagne
Preparation: pour the cognac, sugar syrup, lemon juice and 3 pressed raspberries into the shaker, then shake. strain into the glass (using a cocktail strainer) and fill with chilled champagne. garnish with 3 raspberries.

Name: duke's classic dry martini
Ingredients: 3 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 tsp extra dry vermouth, 1  amalfi lemon
Preparation: pour the extra dry vermouth into a frozen martini glass (either 7 oz. or 5.5 oz. glass) and coat in a circular motion. top up the glass with ice cold no.3 gin. pare the rind of an amalfi lemon, and give it a twist to extract the oils into the glass.

Name: glimpse of seduction
Ingredients: .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz grapefruit flavored vodka, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 float pomegranate liqueur, 2 scoop lemon sorbet
Preparation: pour the first four ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. serve into a champagne saucer. top with pomegranate liqueur float.

Name: bloody fernet
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo fernet, .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 2 scoop blood orange sorbet
Preparation: pour the ingredients in a blender and blend until smooth. serve in a cocktail glass or coupe.

Name: kentucky likker
Ingredients: 1.5 oz hirsch small batch reserve bourbon, 1 oz luxardo amaro abano, 2 dash orange bitters, 1 splash club soda
Preparation: pour the ingredients in an old fashioned glass, then fill up with ice and stir well before serving.

Name: château montifaud lady touch triple sec
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chateau de montifaud reserve speciale michel vallet, .75 oz triple sec, 1 oz lemon juice, 1 oz sugar syrup, 8  fresh mint,   ice cubes
Preparation: pour the ingredients in the shaker. close and shake well until frosted. strain into the glass. garnish with fresh mint.

Name: pink colada
Ingredients: 2 oz pink pigeon rum, 2 oz pineapple juice, 1.5 oz cream of coconut
Preparation: pour the ingredients into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. shake well. strain into a chilled cocktail or collins glass.

Name: profundo
Ingredients: 1.25 oz hirsch small batch reserve bourbon, 1.25 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz chocolate liqueur, 1 oz heavy cream flavored with hum liqueur
Preparation: pour the liquor ingredients over ice and top with half inch (about one centimeter) layer of lightly whipped cream shaken with hum liqueur.

Name: château montifaud on mint
Ingredients: 1 coffee spoon sugar syrup, 10  fresh mint, .25  sliced green lemon, 1 oz chateau de montifaud cognac vsop, .75 oz lemon juice, .75 oz sparkling water
Preparation: pour the sugar syrup into the glass and add fresh mint and green lemon. lightly crush and add ice cubes, cognac, lemon juice and sparkling water. mix with a spoon and serve with a straw.

Name: tequila sunflare
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chinaco blanco tequila, .75 oz sage-cilantro-lime syrup,  rinse montanaro vermouth , 1  pomegranate ice cube
Preparation: pre-freeze pomegranate juice into one large cube. rinse a glass with montanaro vermouth. dump any excess out. build the remainder of spirits and bitters into a shaker tin. shake vigorously. strain over the pomegranate ice cube into a rocks glass.

Name: kiss of persuasion
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 1 oz honey-pear liqueur, .5 oz heavy cream,  oz pinch of cardamom,  oz dehydrated pear slice
Preparation: pre-mix the liquors together and keep refrigerated. serve 2 oz. neat into a small coupe glass. float the fresh cream on top.

Name: marchesa
Ingredients: 30 ml luxardo maraschino liqueur, 20 ml bitter, 20 ml luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, 20 ml bourbon, 2 dash chocolate bitters
Preparation: prepare directly in an old fashioned glass.

Name: brazilian mule punch
Ingredients: 2 part ypioca brasilizar cachaca prata reserva especial, 1 part fresh lime juice, 1 part ancho chile-infused simple syrup, 1 float ginger beer, 2 dash angostura bitters
Preparation:
punch preparation instructions:
combine ypioca, lime and syrup in bowl. top with ginger beer and angostura bitters* (amounts will depend on size of punch and number of anticipated servings). garnish with thin-sliced dried ancho chiles and lime wheels to float.

*you can optionally skip adding angostura in punch and instead add a dash or 2 to each individual cocktail as served.


individual cocktail preparation instructions:
combine ingredients exactly the same way as a traditional moscow mule over crushed ice. garnish with dash or 2 bitters and ancho chile slices. mint is an optional garnish.

Name: coco batida
Ingredients: 1 1/2 oz coconut milk, 1 1/2 oz condensed milk, 3 oz ypiòca, 1 tbsp sugar
Preparation: put 1 1/2 ounces of coconut milk, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk, 3 ounces of ypiòca and tablespoon of sugar in a blender. mix for a few seconds. add ice cubes and serve.

Name: orange batida
Ingredients: 2 1/2 oz orange juice, 1 1/2 oz ypiòca, 1-2 tbsp sugar
Preparation: put 1 1/2 ounces, 2 1/2 ounces orange juice, and 1-2 tablespoons of sugar in a shaker. add ice cubes and shake for a few seconds. put in glass and serve.

Name: passion fruit batida
Ingredients: 1-2 tbsp sugar, 1 1/2 oz ypiòca,   passion fruit
Preparation: put 1/2 passion fruit inner part in a blender, 1-2 tablespoons of sugar and 50ml ( 1 1/2 ounces) of ypiòca. mix for a few seconds. filter in a glass and serve with ice.

Name: peach batida
Ingredients: 3 oz peach juice, 1 1/2 oz condensed milk, 1 1/2 oz ypiòca , 1 tbsp sugar
Preparation: put 3 ounces of peach juice, 1 1/2 ounces of ypiòca, 1 1/2 ounces of condensed milk and 1 tablespoon of sugar in a shaker. add ice cubes, shake well and serve.

Name: karlsson's old fashioned
Ingredients: 2 oz karlsson's gold vodka, 1 cube brown sugar, 1 splash bitter
Preparation:
put a brown sugar cube at the bottom of a frosted glass.
add a splash of bitter and muddle the sugar.
add karlsson's gold vodka and stir with ice.
