Preparation: shake ingredients with ice then strain into an ice-filled collins or pilsner glass.

Name: windtalker
Ingredients: 1.5 oz hirsch small batch reserve bourbon, .75 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, .75 oz fresh lemon juice, .5 oz egg white
Preparation: shake ingredients with ice until well combined. strain into a chilled tumbler or large rocks glass over ice sphere or large ice cubes. garnish with orange peel (or slice) and luxardo original maraschino cherries on a pick.

Name: stinger
Ingredients: 1 part tempus fugit creme de menthe glaciale, 3 part h by hine
Preparation: shake or stir briskly and strain into a cocktail glass.

Name: the great pumpkin cocktail
Ingredients: 1 oz pumpkin-infused glenrothes vintage reserve*, 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, .5 oz grade-a maple syrup (prefer mcclure's)
Preparation:
shake over ice and strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. garnish with a dash of cinnamon.

*pumpkin-infused glenrothes vintage reserve:
peel, clean and cut small 2x2 in. pieces of sugar pumpkin. salt very lightly and roast for about 20 mins. at 250°f. put into a sealed container with scotch and let rest for 2 days. strain off the pumpkin and re-bottle. keep refrigerated.

Name: cherry orchard
Ingredients: .5 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz laird's straight bonded , 1.25 oz clear creek kirschwasser eau de vie, .25 oz lemon juice, .5 oz grapefruit juice, .25 oz simple syrup, 2 dash peychaud's bitters
Preparation: shake over ice. strain into a 6 oz. cocktail glass

Name: slow ride
Ingredients: 1 oz rittenhouse straight rye whisky, .5 oz pusser's rum, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, 2 oz basic house lemonade*,  top abita big easy ipa
Preparation:
shake rye, rum, lemonade, and ginger liqueur. strain over fresh ice in a copper mug. top with abita big easy ipa (or similar session ipa). gently stir.

*basic house lemonade:
-- 2 parts water
-- 1 part sugar
-- 1 part lemon juice

Name: tropical bronzer
Ingredients: 1.5 oz aged rum, 1 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 1 oz passion fruit puree, 2 oz fresh lime sweet n' sour, 2 dash bitters, 1 float coconut foam
Preparation: shake the first five ingredients with ice then strain over fresh ice into a collins or tiki glass. top with coconut foam.

Name: padova collins
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pear flavored vodka, .75 oz luxardo limoncello, .25 oz luxardo sambuca dei cesari, 1.5 oz fresh sweet n' sour mix, 2 oz lemon lime soda
Preparation: shake the first four ingredients with ice then strain into a tall glass filled with ice and top with lemon lime soda. stir and serve.

Name: black jam
Ingredients: 1.5 oz luxardo fernet, .75 oz honey syrup, .75 oz fresh lemon juice, 4 oz tonic water
Preparation: shake the first three ingredients with ice then strain into a collins glass and fill up with tonic water, stir and serve.

Name: americana fizz (layered cocktail)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, .75 oz fresh lemon juice, .25 oz simple syrup, .75 oz the genuine curacao liqueur blue, .5 oz luxardo aperitivo,  splash perrier grapefruit
Preparation: shake the gin, lemon, and simple syrup ingredients together in a shaker to chill. gently pour into a highball glass filled with ice and 3/4 oz curacao blue. top the cocktail with 1/2 oz luxardo aperitivo. add a splash of perrier grapefruit and garnish with luxardo cherries and blueberries for color.

Name: dutch stories
Ingredients: 1.5 oz genevieve gin, .75 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, 1 tbsp gooseberry jam
Preparation: shake the ingredients with ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: strike no.3
Ingredients: 2 oz no.3 london dry gin, .5 oz st. germaine elderflower liqueur, .5 oz orgeat syrup, .5 oz fresh lemon juice
Preparation: shake the ingredients with ice. strain into an old fashioned glass. garnish with a luxardo cherry.

Name: final ward
Ingredients: .75 oz rye whiskey, .75 oz green chartreuse, .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz fresh lemon juice
Preparation: shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. no garnish.

Name: dernier mot
Ingredients: .75 oz rhum agricole, .75 oz green chartreuse, .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz fresh lime juice
Preparation: shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. no garnish.

Name: the asterisk
Ingredients: .75 oz brandy, .75 oz green chartreuse, .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz lemon juice
Preparation: shake until very cold; double strain into a chilled cocktail glass. no garnish.

Name: phineas flip
Ingredients: 2 oz english harbour rum, .75 oz king's ginger liqueur, 1 whole egg
Preparation: shake vigorously. strain into highball glass. top with ale. grated nutmeg.

Name: luxardo sling
Ingredients: .25 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .25 oz grapefruit juice, 1 fill soda water
Preparation: shake well in a shaker, serve in a tumbler filled with ice. top with soda water.

Name: white lady
Ingredients: 2 oz junipero gin, .5 oz luxardo triplum (triple sec), .5 oz lemon juice, 1  egg white
Preparation: shake well with cracked ice, then strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: blue 88
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .25 oz lemon juice, .25 oz pages elderflower syrup, .25 oz tempus fugit liqueur de violettes, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur
Preparation: shake well with lots of ice. strain into cocktail glass.

Name: cherries st. james
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .25 oz lemon juice, .25 oz pages elderflower syrup, .25 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur
Preparation: shake well with lots of ice. strain into cocktail glass.

Name: bachelor's bait
Ingredients: 2 oz junipero gin, 6 dash grapefruit shrub, 3 dash orange bitters, 1 dash grenadine, 1  egg white
Preparation: shake with cracked ice and strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: boomin' granny
Ingredients: 1.5 oz h by hine, 1 oz granny smith apple juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice, .5 oz acacia honey syrup,  top sparkling wine
Preparation: shake with ice and fine strain into a champagne flute. top with sparkling wine and garnish with granny smith apple fan.

Name: basilway daquiri
Ingredients: 1.5 oz basil-infused white rum, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, .25 oz fresh lime juice, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 1 bsp, large grapefruit sorbet
Preparation: shake with ice and single strain into a coupe glass. garnish with basil leaf.

Name: the pink pussycat
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, .5 oz fair goji berry liqueur, .5 oz noyeau de poissy  b, .5 oz cream, 5 dash chocolate bitters
Preparation: shake with ice and strain into a coupe glass. garnish with a toasted marshmallow

Name: double trouble
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, 1 oz strawberry & black pepper shrub*, .75 oz hidalgo la gitana manzanilla sherry, .5 oz lemon juice , few drops peychaud's bitters
Preparation:
shake with ice and strain into a footed pilsner glass. add a few drops of bitters. garnish with a mint leaf.

*strawberry & black pepper shrub:
-- 1 cup sliced strawberries
-- 1 cup granulated sugar
-- 1 cup champagne vinegar
-- 1 handful of black balinese peppers

combine all ingredients in a medium bowl. using a potato masher or a wooden spoon, mash the berries so they release their juices. stir until the sugar has mostly dissolved and refrigerate overnight.
the next day, remove the mixture to a saucepan and heat gently over medium-low heat. do not bring to a simmer--you simply want to heat the mixture to coax the sugar to dissolve.
strain the shrub through a fine mesh strainer. if desired, strain again through a coffee filter. refrigerate.

Name: yawkey way
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .5 oz smith & cross, .5 oz strawberry juice, .5 oz black tea syrup, .5 oz lemon juice, 2 dashes orange bitters
Preparation: shake with ice and strain into an ice-filled collins glass.

Name: cream of the crop
Ingredients: 1 oz mezcal, 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, .75 oz coconut pistachio puree*, .75 oz lemon juice
Preparation:
shake with ice in a mixing glass for about 15 seconds to properly chill. double strain into a small fizz glass over ice.

*coconut pistachio puree:
-- .5 lb pistachios (toasted)
-- 1.5 lbs sugar (144 oz.)
-- 11 oz coconut milk
-- 13 oz water
-- 1 tsp salt

toast the pistachios at 250°f for 20 mins. remove and put in a blender with sugar until well chopped. combine all the ingredients in a pot and bring to a boil. let simmer for 20 mins and then remove from the heat. let cool and place in a large container. let the mixture sit overnight then strain out the solids. save the solids to spin in the ice cream maker (if you have one). spin the solids and add the mixture back into the puree via chinois. bottle, label and date the syrup (it will keep indefinitely if you freeze it).

Name: hemingway daiquiri
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, .75 oz fresh lime juice, .5 oz fresh grapefruit juice, .5 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur
Preparation: shake with ice in a mixing tin and double strain into a chilled cocktail coupe. garnish with a grapefruit twist.

Name: amaretto sour (modern)
Ingredients: 2 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 1 oz fresh squeezed lemon juice, .5 oz pasteurized egg white, 1, small scoop lemon sorbet
Preparation: shake with ice to mix and emulsify. strain into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice. garnish with luxardo maraschino cherries and fresh lemon zest.

Name: amaretto sour
Ingredients: 2 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 1 oz fresh lemon juice, .75 oz simple syrup, .5 oz egg white
Preparation: shake with ice to mix and emulsify. strain into a chilled old fashioned glass filled with ice. garnish with luxardo maraschino cherries and fresh lemon zest.

Name: red letters
Ingredients: .75 oz bols genever, .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz absinthe, .75 oz lime juice
Preparation: shake with ice, strain and pour into a chilled martini glass.

Name: almond brother
Ingredients: 2 oz reposado tequila, .25 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 1 tsp luxardo apricot liqueur, .75 oz lime juice, .25 oz luxardo orgeat syrup, .25 oz maple syrup
Preparation: shake with ice, strain into a coupe. no garnish.

Name: french 33
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .75 oz simple syrup, .75 oz lime juice
Preparation: shake with ice, strain into flute, top with sparkling rose and a grapefruit twist.

Name: 20th century
Ingredients: 1.5 oz no.3 london dry gin, .75 oz tempus fugit kina l'aero d'or, .75 oz tempus fugit creme de cacao, .75 oz fresh lemon juice
Preparation: shake with ice. strain into a chilled cocktail glass.

Name: vesper
Ingredients: 2.25 oz no.3 london dry gin, .75 oz hophead vodka, .5 oz tempus fugit kina l'aero d'or
Preparation: shake with ice. strain into chilled martini glass. garnish with lemon peel.

Name: the seniorita
Ingredients: 1.5 oz the genuine curacao liqueur orange, .5 oz lime juice, 1.5 oz thai coconut milk, 2 dash angostura bitters, 1 float gosslings 151 rum
Preparation: shake with ice. strain into rocks glass and top with crushed ice. float 1 oz. of gosslings 151 rum on top.  garnish with mint and luxardo maraschino cherries.

Name: champs élysées
Ingredients: 2 oz h by hine, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz green chartreuse, .25 oz simple syrup, 2 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: shake with intent. double strain in coupe. garnish with lemon wheel.

Name: the double crown
Ingredients: 1.25 oz compass box great king street glasgow blend, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz cyril zangs double zero eau de vie de cidre, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, .5 oz honey syrup, 1  egg white
Preparation: shake without ice, add ice and shake again then fine strain into a chilled egg coupe. garnish with a sage leaf.

Name: flip the bird
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pink pigeon rum, .75 oz simple syrup, .75 oz cream, .5 oz punt e mes, 1  egg yolk
Preparation: shake without ice, to whip and emulsify ingredients until frothy. add ice to shaker and shake vigorously. strain into port glass or small fluted glass. garnish with shaved cinnamon or nutmeg.

Name: mauritius sour
Ingredients: .75 oz pink pigeon rum, .75 oz hirsch small batch reserve bourbon, .5 oz angostura bitters, .75 oz lemon juice, .75 oz simple syrup
Preparation: shake, and fine strain into a chilled coupe, and garnish with a luxardo cherry.

Name: i'm only happy when it rains
Ingredients: 1 1/2 oz old potrero straight rye whiskey, 3/4 oz hirsh pinot noir reduction, 1/4 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, 3/4 oz lemon juice
Preparation: shake, double strain into a burgundy glass.

Name: monet
Ingredients: 1.75 oz h by hine, 1 oz benriach madeira 15 yo, .5 oz lemon juice, .25 oz briottet creme de banane, .25 oz small hand foods pineapple gum syrup
Preparation: shake, fine strain into a chilled coupe. garnish with lemon twist.

Name: hippi hill
Ingredients: 1.5 oz hophead vodka, .75 oz king's ginger liqueur, .5 oz lime juice, .5 oz cranberry juice
Preparation: shake, fine strain into chilled coupe. garnish with lime wheel.

Name: buster crusta
Ingredients: 2 oz h by hine, 1 oz lemon juice, .75 oz the genuine curacao liqueur orange, .5 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz small hand foods gum syrup, 1 bsp luxardo fernet
Preparation: shake, fine strain into chilled frosted coupe, float fernet.

Name: bird on
Ingredients: .75 oz tempus fugit creme de menthe glaciale, .75 oz tempus fugit alessio vermouth bianco, .75 oz h by hine, .375 oz lemon juice, .375 oz lime juice
Preparation: shake, serve on the rocks, garnish with a lemon wedge.

Name: iron tonic
Ingredients: .75 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .75 oz genepy, .75 oz luxardo fernet, .75 oz lime juice, 1 float tonic water
Preparation: shake, strain into a chilled coupe, float tonic water.

Name: king's medicine
Ingredients: 1.5 oz king's ginger liqueur, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz luxardo fernet, .25 oz benriach curiositas single malt 10 yo
Preparation: shake, strain into a chilled coupe. garnish with lemon twist.

Name: where's the orgeat?
Ingredients: 2 oz h by hine, 1 oz small hand foods orgeat, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz luxardo apricot liqueur, 3 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: shake, strain into a chilled coupe. garnish with lemon twist.

Name: fortune & glory
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chinaco reposado tequila, 1 oz lime juice, .5 oz h by hine, .5 oz small hand foods orgeat, .5 oz falernum, 2 dash mole bitters
Preparation: shake, strain into a chilled coupe. garnish with lime wheel.

Name: pisco punch (adaptation by the comstock saloon)
Ingredients: 1.5 oz barsol selecto italia pisco, .75 oz small hand foods pineapple gum syrup, .75 oz lemon juice, 3 dash kaffir tincture
Preparation: shake, strain into a chilled flip glass with one cube. garnish with lemon peel.

Name: cupid's carrier pigeon
Ingredients: 1 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz velvet falernum, .75 oz pink pigeon rum, 1 oz unfiltered apple juice, 1 oz lime juice, 3 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: shake, strain into a tiki glass over crushed ice and garnish with a large sprig of mint.

Name: the fall 75
Ingredients: 1 oz junipero gin, 1 oz spiced kuri squash purée*, 2 dash fresh lemon, 2 dash honey syrup
Preparation: shake, strain into coupe glass. top with sparkling wine and a sprig of lemon balm.

Name: kentucky mai tai
Ingredients: 1 oz mezcal, 1 oz bourbon, .5 oz lemon, .5 oz peche de vigne, .5 oz cynar, .5 oz orgeat, 4 dash angostura bitters
Preparation: shake, strain over crushed ice in a highball. garnish with a mint sprig and a cherry.

Name: drink lab #16
Ingredients: 2 oz brandy, .75 oz orgeat, .75 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz lemon juice, 10 drops bittermens burlesque bitters
Preparation: shake, strain, lemon twist garnish.

Name: grey anchor
Ingredients: 2 oz hophead vodka, .75 oz lime juice, .5 oz st. germaine elderflower liqueur, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 5 drops bittercube door county hop bitters
Preparation: shake, strain, up, garnish.

Name: pumpkin & pecan
Ingredients: 2 oz h by hine, .5 oz toasted pecan syrup, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz cynar, 1 bsp spiced pumpkin butter, 2 dash cinnamon tincture
Preparation: shake. double strain. king cube. orange peel garnish

Name: the red anchor
Ingredients: 1.75 oz junipero gin, .75 oz lemon juice, .5 oz grapefruit juice, .5 oz tempus fugit kina l'aero d'or, .25 oz ginger syrup, .25 oz simple syrup (1.5 : 1)
Preparation: shake. serve in small rocks glass with no ice. grapefruit slice to garnish.

Name: holland house
Ingredients: 1 oz genever, 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz dry vermouth, .5 oz lemon juice, .5 oz pineapple gomme syrup
Preparation: shake. serve up. garnish with lemon peel/pineapple.

Name: last samurai
Ingredients: 1 oz vodka, 1 oz gin, 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz cointreau
Preparation: shake. serve up. garnish with lime wheel.

Name: long division
Ingredients: 1.5 oz tequila, 1 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, .5 oz aperol, .25 oz lime juice
Preparation: shake. serve up. top with sparkling rose. garnish with lime peel.

Name: sidecar
Ingredients: 2 oz hine rare vsop, .75 oz mathilde orange xo liqueur, .75 oz lemon juice, 1 tsp demerara syrup (2:1)
Preparation: shake. strain into a coupe. garnish with a lime twist.

Name: spiced marmalade
Ingredients: 2 oz junipero gin, 1 bsp orange marmalade, .5 oz lemon juice, 1 oz orange juice, .25 oz simple syrup, 2 dash orange bitters, 4  cloves torched & muddled
Preparation:
shake/2strain/coupe

garnish lemon twist

Name: mezcal witch
Ingredients: 2 oz mezcal, .75 oz lime, .75 oz strega, .75 oz simple syrup, 3-4  cucumbers muddled, 3-4  mint leaves, 1 pinch salt
Preparation:
shake/2xstrain/coupe

garnish cucumber slice

Name: italian margarita
Ingredients: 1.5 oz maestro dobel diamante tequila, .5 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, 1 oz fresh lime juice, .25 oz monin cane syrup
Preparation: shaken and served over ice.

Name: a bloody shame
Ingredients: 1.5 oz vodka, .5 oz luxardo amaretto di saschira, .75 oz blood orange vanilla mint puree*, .75 oz lime juice
Preparation:
shaken and strained into a large coupe. garnish with a dehydrated lime wheel soaked in angostura bitters.

*blood orange vanilla mint puree:
-- 1 container boiron blood orange puree (34 oz.)
-- 39 grams mint (stems and leaves)
-- 1 tsp vanilla extract
-- 30 oz white sugar

combine all the ingredients except the mint in a pot.
bring to a light simmer, stirring to incorporate everything.
then add the mint and cook for 5 minutes, then remove the pot from the heat and strain through a chinois to remove the mint.
label and date a container, then place in your fridge. use within a week.

Name: full of bologna
Ingredients: 1 oz c. drouin calvados selection, 1 oz luxardo amaro abano, .75 oz pear watercress puree, .75 oz lemon juice
Preparation: shaken and strained into a large coupe. mint oil is house-made and used as a garnish.

Name: donaji
Ingredients: 2 oz mezcal, .5 oz fresh lemon juice, .5 oz fresh lime juice, .75 oz agave nectar
Preparation:
shaken and strained over ice in a rocks glass.

*chapuline, salt & chile pepper rim:
grind the chapuline  (dried crickets) and dried chile pepper in a mortar and pestle, as it becomes a powder, throw in the salt and pour onto a plate. use a fresh lime wedge to moisten the rim of the glass and dip into the powder.

Name: monkey gland
Ingredients: 2 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 oz orange juice, .25 oz grenadine, 1 dash duplais swiss absinthe blanche
Preparation: shaken and strained. orange peel garnish.

Name: you go glen coco
Ingredients: 1.25 oz old potrero straight rye whiskey (toasted coconut infused)*, .5 oz king's ginger liqueur, 1.25 oz turmeric coconut cream**
Preparation:
shaken slightly. served over shaved ice in an old fashioned glass. garnished with turmeric toasted coconut flakes.

*toasted coconut infused old potrero
-- 750ml old potrero straight rye whiskey
-- 2.5 oz toasted coconut

combine all ingredients in a clean container and let sit for 8 hours.
strain through cheesecloth and then funnel back into your old potrero bottles.
keeps indefinitely.

**turmeric coconut cream:
-- 12 g fresh turmeric
-- 1 c water
-- 1 c honey
-- 3 tsp black pepper
-- 12 oz coconut milk

grate fresh turmeric into 1 cup water.
bring to a boil, add 1 cup of honey and stir.
remove from heat and let the mix sit for 1:30 hours.
strain out turmeric and add 3 tsp. ground black pepper.
add 12 oz. coconut milk and stir.
place in an airtight container and keep in the fridge. use within a week.

Name: just beet it
Ingredients: 1.5 oz junipero gin, 1 oz beet thyme reduction*, .5 oz licor 43, .5 oz lemon juice, .5  egg white
Preparation:
shaken without ice, then with ice and strained into a large coupe. garnished with candied thyme.

*beet thyme reduction
-- 520 grams raw beets
-- 344 grams honey
-- 2 oranges peeled (just the peels)
-- 2 sprigs of thyme
-- pinch of salt

juice beets, add honey and let dissolve and cook for 15 mins.
add thyme and simmer for 5 more mins.
strain through a chinois into a container and then place in the fridge.
this makes 1 quart, so multiply as needed.
use within 1 week.

Name: nectar of the amazon
Ingredients: 2 oz ypioca cachaca prata*, 1 oz passion fruit juice, 1 oz condensed milk
Preparation: shaken, poured over fresh ice in highball. garnish with macadamia nut. coconut shaved rim.

Name: thyme for bed
Ingredients: 1.5 oz chamucos blanco tequila, .5 oz luxardo sangue morlacco cherry liqueur, .5 oz thyme simple syrup, .5 oz lime juice
Preparation: shaken.

Name: mott and mulberry
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo amaro abano, 1 oz old overholt rye, .5 oz demerara simple syrup (1:1), .5 oz lemon juice, .75 oz fuji apple cider
Preparation: shaker and strain into a rocks glass with fresh ice. garnish with an apple fan.

Name: carrier pigeon (an airmail with pink pigeon)
Ingredients: 1 oz pink pigeon rum, .5 oz lime juice, .5 oz honey
Preparation:
short shake-strain into champagne flute- top with champagne.
drop a luxardo cherry into the flute.

Name: the king's mulled wine
Ingredients: 1 bottle red wine, .3 bottle king's ginger liqueur, 3 tbsp caster sugar, 2  lemons, zested (plus flesh of one lemon), 1  orange, zested, 1 stick cinnamon, 1 dash nutmeg, 1  star anise
Preparation: simmer over low heat for 3 hours, double strain with fine sieve.

Name: tea & sympathy
Ingredients: 1 oz avua amburana cachaça, 1 oz king's ginger liqueur, .5 oz fresh squeezed lemon juice, 1 bag chai tea
Preparation:
soak 1 chai tea bag in half mug of hot water for 30 seconds, remove the tea bag, add all the ingredients, add more hot water.

lemon wheel stuffed with 4-5 cloves for garnish.

Name: huntsman
Ingredients: 2 oz pink pigeon rum, 1 cube brown sugar
Preparation: soak brown sugar cube in angostura and orange bitters. muddle soaked sugar cube into a paste in a rocks glass. pour 2 oz. pink pigeon. add ice and stir. garnish with an orange peel and luxardo cherry.

Name: the callas cocktail
Ingredients: 1 oz luxardo bitter bianco, .75 oz no.3 london dry gin, 1 bsp pomegranate cordial*, 1.25 oz brachetto, 1  sugar cube, 8 dash tempus fugit abbott's bitters
Preparation:
soak cube in 8 dashes abbott's bitter. drop sugar cube into bottom of flute glass. stir, luxardo, gin, and pomegranate cordial. strain into flute glass. top with brachetto. garnish with small rose, dipped in rose flower water.

*pomegranate cordial:
-- 48 oz pomegranate juice
-- 2.5 lbs white sugar
-- 1 lb turbinado sugar
-- 8 course cracked black peppercorns
-- 2 cloves
-- 5 allspice berries
-- 1 tbsp pomegranate molasses
-- 1 oz orange flower water

mix all ingredients together in large saucepan. stir on medium heat until all sugar is dissolved. strain of spices. bottle.

Name: mauritian buck
Ingredients: 40 ml pink pigeon rum, 40 ml pressed apple juice,   ginger ale,   absinthe,   lemon zest
Preparation: spray a rocks glass with absinthe, build all other ingredients over cubed ice, garnish with a lemon wheel.

Name: the cavalier white lady
Ingredients: 1 oz junipero gin, .75 oz creole shrub, .75 oz lemon juice, .25 oz lemon bitters, .5 oz simple syrup, 1  egg white
Preparation: spray of lemon verbana oil on the martini glass. combine all other ingredients and dry shake for 20 seconds. add ice to the mixing tin and shake again. double strain into a martini glass. garnish with fresh lemon verbena. served in a martini.

Name: winter season
Ingredients: 2 oz barr hill honey gin, 1 oz lemon juice, .25 oz liquid alchemist orgeat, .25 oz luxardo maraschino liqueur, 1 bsp dijon blue curaçao
Preparation: spray the inside of the glass with absinthe, then sugar the external rim of the glass. pour ingredients into a cocktail shaker. shake and strain into the glass.

Name: land of valencia
Ingredients: .75 oz luxardo bitter bianco, 1.5 oz bols genever, .5 oz clarified coconut sugar blood orange cordial*, 1 dash copper & kings absinthe
Preparation:
spray vessel with absinthe as a rinse. build cocktail in a stirring glass. stir cocktail. place a large format cube in the vessel. pour cocktail over large format cube.

to garnish, peel a blood orange skin and express the oils over the cocktail. grab mint sprigs and slap over the top of hand to express oils, wrap the peel at the base of the mint sprigs, tie off with twine and set on top of large format cube.

*clarified coconut sugar blood orange cordial:
-- blood oranges
-- agar agar
-- coconut sugar

juice blood oranges. bring 1/4 of juice to a boil with agar agar. pour cooked juice into the remaining 3/4 juice. freeze the juice. pull the block from the freezer and let drip through cheese cloth and perforated pan creating the clarified juice. bring the juice together with a rich (2:1) coconut sugar creating a coconut sugar blood orange cordial.

Name: smashing great pumpkins
Ingredients: 1.5 oz pumpkin vodka, .75 oz new york apple whisky, .75 oz king's ginger liqueur, .5 oz hot water
Preparation: steam in steaming tin. pour in demitasse glass. top with heavy whipping cream and nutmeg.

Name: green and gold
Ingredients: 750 ml bottle karlsson's gold vodka, 5 sprigs dill, 2 cloves crushed garlic, 1  lemon peel (white pith removed and julienned), 1 tbsp whole peppercorns
Preparation:
step one: infuse the vodka
- transfer ingredients including 750 ml of karlsson's vodka to a canning jar or glass container. close the container.
- shake and rotate every few hours. let infuse for 24 hours total.
- after 24 hours, strain the vodka through a cheesecloth or nutmilk bag.
- transfer the vodka to a glass bottle. store in the refrigerator or freezer until use.

step two: make the martini
- stir 2-3 oz, depending on preference, of the infused vodka with ice.
